    Below are recent documentation updates.

    If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Documentation Updates document.

    25-November-2022

    New Docs

    • Title: Chromecast with the Native SDKs
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to cast videos to a Chromecast-connected TV from your apps built with the Brightcove Native SDKs.

    • Product: Device SDKs
    • Product Area: Chromecast

    • Title: JSON Web トークン (JWT)
    • Description: Removed some obsolete fields from the Japanese version
    • Link: https://ja.general.support.brightcove.com/developer/create-json-web-token.html
